title: Apple Watch Series 10: a powerhouse that goes beyond monitoring
description: Series 10 boasts of Apple’s largest and most advanced display. It has 30% more screen area, a 40% brighter display, which improves visibility and readability, and an OLED screen that’s very power-efficient. Series 10 is also the thinnest Apple Watch ever, at 9.7 millimeters. A metal back integrates the antenna into the housing, improving cellular performance and maintaining 50-metre water resistance.
content: It has been eight years since the Apple Watch Series 1 debuted. That iteration had focused on basic health tracking and notifications, but it set the stage for the way we approach wearables today.
